description:
Insulated waterproof gloves intended for skiing, snowboarding, and other mountain-loving winter sports. The gauntlet cinches closed for maximum wrist coverage, while grippy palms, fingers, and thumbs provide the dexterity needed for smooth handling of gear. The soft, warm fleece lining is protected behind a waterproof insert, and a zippered pocket accommodates a heater-pack.

  • Shell is 100% polyester mini ripstop
  • The palms and thumbs have tough PU coating for grip
  • High loft insulation for maximum warmth
  • Dri-Max waterproof inserts
  • Soft brushed thermofleece lining wicks moisture
name: Gordini Ultra Dri-Max Gauntlet IV Gloves Junior - Children to Youths
